title: final[edit]
content:
final is a keyword. Beware! It has distinct meanings depending whether it is used for a class, a method, or for a variable. It must be placed before the variable type or the method return type. It is recommended to place it after the access modifier and after the static keyword.Code section 1: Keyword order.


1 private static final long serialVersionUID = -5437975414336623381L;
